data.title: Introduction

cardData.subtitle: Get started with some logic warmups.

cardData.subtitle: Who or what is telling the truth?

cardData.title: Strategic Deductions

data.title: The Rational Detective
data.subtitle: Eliminate the impossible and uncover the truth!

cardData.title: Riddles of Order
cardData.subtitle: What order do these racers finish in?

cardData.title: Crafty Counting
cardData.subtitle: Learn Strategies for counting that go far beyond just counting.

cardData.title: Futoshiki
cardData.subtitle: Arrange the numbers to match the inequalities.

cardData.title: Suffles
cardData.subtitle: Where did everything get suffled to.

cardData.title: Mystery Containers
cardData.subtitle: What is in each of these boxes?

cardData.title: False Information
cardData.subtitle: Solve problems where the people giving you hints might be lying.
